description: Creates and updates a set of field options for a single select field in a Cases domain.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a field.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: A list of FieldOption objects. (dict) --- Object for field Options information. Describes whether the FieldOption is active (displayed) or inactive. FieldOptionName has max length 100 and disallows trailing spaces. FieldOptionValue has max length 100 and must be alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores.

nested_params.name: active
nested_params.description: Describes whether the FieldOption is active (displayed) or inactive.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: FieldOptionName has max length 100 and disallows trailing spaces.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: FieldOptionValue has max length 100 and must be alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: Error code from creating or updating field option.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: Error message from creating or updating field option.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The field option value that caused the error.
